name: Van Wizards: Season 1 Vibes
description:
This collection contains all previously released Vibes and 2 new ones!

Explore different aspects of the Van Wizards world as your van of wizards travel, vibe, and fight off the Mageocracy from taking Magical Artifacts! 

Visit an old desert town in The Inevitable Fireball!

Take a trip under the sea with a dash of queer longing!

Journey to a Volcano!
